data.title: Airport Information
data.text:
The check-in counter for La Compagnie is located on Level 3, Zone 3 of Terminal B at Newark International Airport.

Newark Airport is located around 4 mi. (6km) from Newark (in New Jersey, a western suburb of New York) and 15.5 mi. (25km) from Manhattan.

May 13 to June 21, 2024:

Due to TSA security upgrades, screening lane technology will be replaced at Newark Liberty International (EWR) Airport's Terminal B from Monday, May 13 through Friday, June 21. No more than one lane per checkpoint will be taken out of service each week.

Security screening wait times may be longer than normal. Please arrive at least 3 hours before your scheduled departure time.

For the full weekly lane closure schedule and to view airlines operating at each gate area, please visit https://www.newarkairport.com/announcements/tsa-service-advisory#overall

ACCESS TO THE AIRPORT

By AirTrain Newark: from Penn Station located in the center of Manhattan, in 40 minutes. Know more

By bus: Airport Express offers transportation service from the Port Authority Bus Terminal (W41st Street) to Newark Liberty Airport, in 50 minutes. Know more

By car: Newark Liberty International Airport is situated between the cities of Newark and Elizabeth in the state of New Jersey.

Address: 3 Brewster Rd, Newark, 07114, United States

Parking: Newark Airport has 3 short-term parking lots in front of each terminal.

Newark also offers a long-term parking service accessible by shuttle.

For more information, please visit the airport's website.

TSA PreCheck is an expedited security screening program for travelers departing from airports in the United States. TSA PreCheck uses an intelligence-driven, risk-based approach, delivering the most effective security screening in the most efficient way.

Therefore, it allows passengers to go through security checks without the need to remove shoes, belts, and light jackets. Plus, their electronics and 3-1-1 liquids can stay securely packed in their bags.

To benefit from it, just follow these simple steps:

1.Join the TSA PreCheck program and receive your Known Traveler Number (KTN).

2.Add your KTN during booking and check-in process.

3.Look for the TSA PreCheck indicator on your boarding pass.

4.The day of departure, head straight to the TSA PreCheck screening at the airport.

Apply now for TSA PreCheck: www.tsa.gov/precheck

Alfred Travel collects your luggage from Orly Airport and delivers it in Paris, where and when you need it. And vice versa!

Ideal for enjoying Paris from the first to the last minute, the service is 100% customizable.

A VIP option is available which includes support at the customs fast-track, a pick-up of your suitcases directly on the luggage carousel and the delivery to your hotel or accommodation.

You won’t need to wait for your luggage to arrive and you can exit the airport as quickly as possible!

The VIP option is also available on departure from Paris. This includes personalised assistance at the airport, luggage porterage and fast-track through customs.

As a La Compagnie’s passenger, you can book this service through a dedicated telephone number, +33 6 70 24 42 05 from 6 am to 2 pm, 7 days a week. (Number valid for calls, SMS and WhatsApp).

The check-in counter for La Compagnie is in Terminal 2 of Nice Côte d'Azur International Airport, which is situated in the Alpes-Maritimes region, just 7.6km (4.7 mi.) from the city center of Nice.

ACCESS TO THE AIRPORT

By tram: Line 2 of the Nice tramway serves Aéroport Terminal 2 (also the name of the stop). Duration: less than 30 minutes. Know more

By bus: The Nice Centre Express provides transportation service between the airport and various points of interest in the city. Lines 98 and 99 also serve Terminal 2 of the airport. Duration: 30 to 40 minutes. Know more

By car: via the A8 highway. Duration: 20 to 35 minutes depending on traffic. Parking is available at Parc P5 or Parc P6 and P7 for long-term stays. There is a drop-off area in front of the terminal.

Address: 19 Rue Costes et Bellonte, 06200 Nice

For more information, please visit the airport's website
